title: Hong Kong Airlines Starts First Codeshare with Air Mauritius
text:
Hong Kong Airlines Starts First Codeshare with Air Mauritius   
Sep 01, 2015 eTN   
Hong Kong Airlines, an internationally-acclaimed Skytrax 4-star airline, and Air Mauritius, the flag carrier of Mauritius and also a Skytrax 4-star airline, entered a codeshare agreement today to provide travellers with enhanced connections to Mauritius. Under the codeshare, Hong Kong Airlines will place its "HX" code on Air Mauritius' twice-weekly direct flights between Hong Kong and Mauritius. 
Mr. Li Dianchun, Commercial Director of Hong Kong Airlines, said: "We are extremely delighted to partner with Air Mauritius. This agreement enables us to maximize the travel opportunities offered to passengers as our network further expands across continents to the Indian Ocean." 
"Mauritius has a trove of natural history. We are happy that our passengers will have a new exciting travel option to this beautiful land." Mr. Li added. 
"The development of Asian routes is key to our network strategy. Destinations like Hong Kong have grown to become important for our network as it gives access to China and other East Asian destinations. We trust that both airlines will fully benefit from the new prospects offered by this collaboration. We will continue to work together and explore other avenues for strengthening this cooperation." stated the Air Mauritius Chairman, Dr Arjoon Suddhoo. 
Tickets under the codeshare agreement for travel period from today onwards can be purchased via travel agents or through the airlines' sales offices and call centers.
